body_html:
Sorry for all the commits- I'm struggling with how to access the select and less functions from the Control Flow subsection of the Python API. I think I have it figured out with the last commit.

The cdf test passes on my computer when run outside of Bazel, and I'm having issues running Bazel locally (it's killing my MacBook Air's memory after running for several hours).
body_text:
Sorry for all the commits- I'm struggling with how to access the select and less functions from the Control Flow subsection of the Python API. I think I have it figured out with the last commit.
The cdf test passes on my computer when run outside of Bazel, and I'm having issues running Bazel locally (it's killing my MacBook Air's memory after running for several hours).
body:
Sorry for all the commits- I'm struggling with how to access the `select` and `less` functions from the [Control Flow subsection of the Python API](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/control_flow_ops/). I think I have it figured out with the last commit.

The cdf test passes on my computer when run outside of Bazel, and I'm having issues running Bazel locally (it's killing my MacBook Air's memory after running for several hours).
